name: myfarm
description: The MyFarm is a website that helps farmers to keep track of their farm produces. It constitutes of anything that is produced or kept in the farm. It has produces classified into two main classes; plants and animals. The plants in this case are cereals (wheat, rice, corn, barley, oats, sorghum, and millet), legumes (beans, lentils, peas, chickpeas, and soybeans), tubers (sweet potatoes, yams, and cassava), vegetables (tomatoes, carrots, potatoes, lettuce, peppers, onions, and cucumbers), and fruits (apples, oranges, bananas, grapes, strawberries, watermelons, and peaches). The animals are as follows livestock (cattle, sheep, goats, horses, rabbits, donkey, pigs, chickens, ducks, and turkeys), aquaculture (fish, shrimp, crabs, and oysters), beekeeping.
author: Charles Mbithi
